## StreamSyncOpts.close property

If false or `CloseMode.NEVER`<!-- -->, StreamSync stays active even if all inputs are done. If true, or `CloseMode.LAST`<!-- -->, the StreamSync closes when the last input is done. If `CloseMode.FIRST`<!-- -->, the instance closes when the first input is done.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
close: boolean | CloseMode;
```
